details.purpose: Zur Dokumentation eines Problems, eines Zustandes oder eines Sachverhalts mit anhaltender Bedeutung für die Gesundheit der Person
details.use: Zur Dokumentation eines ehemaligen oder aktuellen Problems - also zur Dokumentation ehemaliger Entwicklungen, sowie derzeitiger Probleme. Mit wechselndem 'Subjekt der Daten' zur Dokumentation von Problemen Verwandter, und somit für die Familienanamnese.
details.misuse: Spezialisierungen 'openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem-diagnosis' für medizinische Diagnosen und 'openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem-diagnosis-histological' für histologische Diagnosen benutzen.

details.purpose: Para registrar detalhes sobre um caso ou obstáculo que tenha impactos sobre o bem estar físico, mental e/ou social de um indivíduo.
details.use: Usado para registrar qualquer informação sobre qualquer problema relacionado a saúde em geral. O Arquétipo contém múltiplas datas, então pode registrar problemas presentes e/ou passados. Um problema pode ser determinado tanto pelo próprio indivíduo como pelo profissional de saúde. Alguns exemplos: - Uma coleção de sintomas que estão sob investigação, mas pré-diagnose - Desejo de perder peso, sem diagnóstico formal de Obesidade - Desejo de parar de fumar pelo indivíduo - Problemas de relacionamento com membro familiar
details.misuse: Não deve ser usado para registro de diagnósticos formais - usar a especialização deste arquétipo, EVALUATION.problem-diagnosis.

details.purpose: For recording details about an issue or obstacle that impacts on the physical, mental and/or social well-being of an individual.
details.use: Use for recording any information about general health-related problems. The archetype contains multiple dates, so can record present and/or past problems. A problem can be determined by either the individual themselves or a healthcare provider. Some examples: - A range of symptoms that are under investigation but pre-diagnosis - Desire to lose weight, without formal diagnosis of Obesity - Desire to quit smoking by individual - Relationship problem with family member
details.misuse: Not to be used for recording formal Diagnoses - use the specialisation of this archetype, EVALUATION.problem-diagnosis.

items.items: *An issue or obstacle which adversely impacts on the physical, mental and/or social well-being of an individual. The definition of a problem is deliberately kept rather loose so as to capture any real or perceived concerns that may adversely affect an individual's wellbeing to any degree. (en)
*The date when the problem was first identified by the individual.(en)
*The age of the individual when the problem was first identified by the individual.(en)
*The assessed overall severity of the index problem.(en)
*The severity of the index problem is mild, not affecting life or longevity.(en)
*The severity of the index problem is such as to cause significant morbidity.(en)
*The severity of the index problem has had a major effect on life and/or longevity.(en)
*Description of the clinical aspects of the problem.(en)
*Date the problem was recognised by a healthcare provider.(en)
*Location of the problem in terms of body site.(en)
*Agents or Factors known to have been of aetiological significance.(en)
*Agent or other factor known to have caused this problem.(en)
*Identification of a problem, injury or condition as text,coded text or link within the EHR.(en)
*Grouping of information about individual occurrences or exacerbations.(en)
*The frequency of individual occurrences of the problem.(en)
*The date of the last occurrence of the problem.(en)
*A description of the exacerbation or occurrence.(en)
*Date of onset of occurrence or exacerbation.(en)
*Number of times this problem has occurred or been apparent.(en)
*Further problems that are related in some way to the index problem.(en)
*A group of characteristics of the problem complicating the index problem.(en)
*Identification of a related problem as text,coded text or link within the EHR.(en)
*The date that the problem resolved or went into remission.(en)
*The age of the person at the resolution of the problem.(en)
*Useful information on the internet about this condition.(en)
*Date of the resolution of the occurrence or exacerbation.(en)
*Age at which the problem was recognised by a healthcare provider.(en)
*Description of the clinical significance of the problem in terms of impact of the problem on the patient.(en)
Um caso ou obstáculo que tenha impactos sobre o bem estar físico, mental e/ou social de um indivíduo
A data de quando o problema foi identificado pela primeira vez pelo indivíduo.
A idade do indivíduo quando o problema foi identificado pela primeira vez pelo indivíduo.
A avaliação global da gravidade dos indicadores problema.
A gravidade dos indicadores do problema é suave, não afeta vida ou longevidade.
A gravidade dos indicadores do problema pode causar morbidez significativa.
A gravidade dos indicadores do problema teve um efeito importante sobre a vida e/ou longevidade.
Descrição dos aspectos clínicos do problema.
Data em que o problema foi ouvido pelo profissional de saúde.
Localização do problema em termos de local do corpo.
Agentes ou fatores conhecidos por terem importância etiológica.
Agente ou outro fator conhecido por ter causado este problema.
Identificação de um problema, lesão ou doença como texto, texto codificado ou link dentro do RES.
Agrupamento de informações sobre ocorrências individuais ou exacerbações.
A frequência de ocorrências individuais do problema.
A data da última ocorrência do problema.
Informações sobre uma ocorrência ou exacerbação
Uma descrição da exacerbação ou ocorrência.
Data do começo da ocorrência ou exacerbação.
Número de vezes que este problema ocorreu ou foi aparente.
Outros problemas que estão relacionados de alguma forma aos indicadores do problema.
Um grupo de características do problema complicando os indicadores do problema.
dentificação textual de um problema relacionado, texto codificado ou link dentro do RES.
A data em que o problema resolvido ou entrou em remissão.
A idade da pessoa com a resolução do problema.
Referência a materiais sobre esta condição.
Informações úteis na internet sobre essa condição.
Data da resolução da ocorrência ou exacerbação.
Idade quando o problema foi ouvido por um profissional de saúde.
Descrição do significado clínico do problema em termos de impacto do problema no paciente.

An issue or obstacle which adversely impacts on the physical, mental and/or social well-being of an individual. The definition of a problem is deliberately kept rather loose so as to capture any real or perceived concerns that may adversely affect an individual's wellbeing to any degree.
The date when the problem was first identified by the individual.
The age of the individual when the problem was first identified by the individual.
The assessed overall severity of the index problem.
The severity of the index problem is mild, not affecting life or longevity.
The severity of the index problem is such as to cause significant morbidity.
The severity of the index problem has had a major effect on life and/or longevity.
Description of the clinical aspects of the problem.
Date the problem was recognised by a healthcare provider.
Location of the problem in terms of body site.
Agents or Factors known to have been of aetiological significance.
Agent or other factor known to have caused this problem.
Identification of a problem, injury or condition as text,coded text or link within the EHR.
Grouping of information about individual occurrences or exacerbations.
The frequency of individual occurrences of the problem.
The date of the last occurrence of the problem.
Information about one occurrence or exacerbation.
A description of the exacerbation or occurrence.
Outcome of the occurrence or exacerbation.
Date of onset of occurrence or exacerbation.
Number of times this problem has occurred or been apparent.
Further problems that are related in some way to the index problem.
A group of characteristics of the problem complicating the index problem.
Identification of a related problem as text,coded text or link within the EHR.
The date that the problem resolved or went into remission.
The age of the person at the resolution of the problem.
Reference to material about this condition.
Useful information on the internet about this condition.
Date of the resolution of the occurrence or exacerbation.
Age at which the problem was recognised by a healthcare provider.
Description of the clinical significance of the problem in terms of impact of the problem on the patient.
